field.name: RXEDGIE
field.description: RxD Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

field.name: LBKDIE
field.description: LIN Break Detect Interrupt or DMA Request Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: LBKDIF interrupt and DMA transfer requests disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LBKDIF interrupt or DMA transfer requests enabled

field.name: ILT
field.description: Idle-line Type Select\nDetermines if idle character bit count starts after start bit or stop bit

field.name: RSRC
field.description: Receiver Source Select\nSelect between loop-back and single-wire mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Selects internal loop back mode. The receiver input is internally connected to transmitter output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Single wire UART mode where the receiver input is connected to the transmit pin input signal

field.name: LOOPS
field.description: Loop Mode Select\nControls loop mode where transmitter output is internally connected to receiver input. [See also RSRC]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Loop mode\t where output internally connected to input

field.name: RWU
field.description: Receiver Wakeup Control\nSetting RWU enables the wakeup function and inhibits further receiver interrupt requests.\n Normally, hardware wakes the receiver by automatically clearing RWU

field.name: RIE
field.description: Receiver Full Interrupt/DMA requests\nAllows interrupt or DMA requests triggered by RDRF

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RDRF interrupt and DMA transfer requests disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RDRF interrupt or DMA transfer requests enabled

field.name: TCIE
field.description: Transmission Complete Interrupt or DMA Transfer Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TC interrupt and DMA transfer requests disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: TC interrupt or DMA transfer requests enabled

field.name: TIE
field.description: Transmitter Interrupt or DMA Transfer Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TDRE interrupt and DMA transfer requests disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: TDRE interrupt or DMA transfer requests enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No error detected since the last time this flag was cleared. If the receive buffer has a depth greater than 1, then there may be data in the receive buffer what was received with a parity error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: At least one dataword was received with a parity error since the last time this flag was cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No error since the last time this flag was cleared. If the receive buffer has a depth greater than 1 then there may be data in the receiver buffer that was received with noise

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: At least one dataword was received with noise detected since the last time the flag was cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No error has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Overrun has occurred or the overrun flag has not been cleared since the last overrun occured

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Receiver input is either active now or has never become active since the IDLE flag was last cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Receiver input has become idle or the flag has not been cleared since it last asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Break character is detected at one of the following lengths: 10 bit times if C1[M] = 0 11 bit times if C1[M] = 1 and C4[M10] = 0 12 bit times if C1[M] = 1, C4[M10] = 1, and S1[PE] = 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Break character is detected at length of 11 bit times if C1[M] = 0 or 12 bits time if C1[M] = 1

field.name: BRK13
field.description: Break Transmit Character Length\nDetermines whether the transmit break character is 10, 11, or 12 bits long, or 13 or 14 bits long

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Break character is 10, 11, or 12 bits long

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Break character is 13 or 14 bits long

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: LSB (bit0) is the first bit that is transmitted following the start bit. Further, the first bit received after the start bit is identified as bit0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: MSB (bit8, bit7 or bit6) is the first bit that is transmitted following the start bit, depending on the setting of C1[M] and C1[PE]. Further, the first bit received after the start bit is identified as bit8, bit7, or bit6, depending on the setting of C1[M] and C1[PE]

field.name: RXEDGIF
field.description: RxD Pin Active Edge Interrupt Flag

field.name: TXDIR
field.description: Transmitter Pin Data Direction in Single-Wire mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The parity bit is the ninth bit in the serial transmission

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The parity bit is the tenth bit in the serial transmission

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: All data received is transferred to the data buffer if MAEN1 is cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: All data received with the most significant bit cleared, is discarded. All data received with the most significant bit set, is compared with contents of MA2 register. If no match occurs, the data is discarded. If a match occurs, data is transferred to the data buffer

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: All data received is transferred to the data buffer if MAEN2 is cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: All data received with the most significant bit cleared, is discarded. All data received with the most significant bit set, is compared with contents of MA1 register. If no match occurs, the data is discarded. If match occurs, data is transferred to the data buffer

field.name: LBKDDMAS
field.description: LIN Break Detect DMA Select Bit

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: If BDH[LBKDIE] and S2[LBKDIF] are set, the LBKDIF interrupt signal is asserted to request an interrupt service

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: If BDH[LBKDIE] and S2[LBKDIF] are set, the LBKDIF DMA request signal is asserted to request a DMA transfer

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: If C2[ILIE] and S1[IDLE] are set, the IDLE interrupt request signal is asserted to request an interrupt service

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: If C2[ILIE] and S1[IDLE] are set, the IDLE DMA request signal is asserted to request a DMA transfer

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: If C2[TCIE] is set and the S1[TC] flag is set, the TC interrupt request signal is asserted to request an interrupt service

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: If C2[TCIE] is set and the S1[TC] flag is set, the TC DMA request signal is asserted to request a DMA transfer

field.name: TDMAS
field.description: Transmitter Interrupt/DMA Select\nSelects between DMA and interrupt requests when C2[TIE] and S1[TDRE] flags are set
